title: sendbloop - Soundboard for Zoom
content:
Legal Notice

  • Identity of the company: Clément Baudet
  • SIRET: 912 065 166 00015
  • Publication director: Clément Baudet - home@sendbloop.com

Hosting

  • Vercel
  • Cloudflare

Privacy Policy

The mention "our" and "the Service" refer to the sendbloop.com site.

Use of collected personal data

Statistics and audience measurements

In order to analyze site traffic (number of visits, pages viewed, etc.), we use a third-party service. The data is anonymized and does not identify individual user behavior, but rather a general trend.

Event logs (or logs )

When you visit our site, our servers may record data from your browser. This may include your "Internet Protocol" (IP) address from your computer, the browser used and its version, the pages you visit, the date and time of the visit and other elements.

Zoom data

When you link your account to Zoom, we request the scope to view information about the profile, this allows us to display your name and profile picture in the application as well as to get the owner account of the Zoom account.

We only store Zoom data we need to make sendbloop functionnal. This data is stored securely on our server and kept while you use the Service.

By using sendbloop.com, you agree with Zoom Privacy Policy.

Commercial data

Commercial data corresponds to the data accumulated during the use of the services provided by the site. This may include uploaded files (eg company logo), information regarding your subscription, analytics and other metrics, and other information created or generated while using our service.

Duration of storage of your data

When you close your account, all data we have are also deleted

The rights you have over your data

If you have an account, you can request the deletion of personal data concerning you. This does not take into account data stored for administrative, legal or security reasons.

  • If you have an account that you want your information deleted, you can contact us at home [at] sendbloop.com.

Transmission of your personal data

We may transmit personal information to:

  • third party service providers for the purpose of providing their service. This includes (non-exhaustive list): the storage of videos and other files uploaded, the host, the logging of errors, the recording of statistics and the collection of payments.

Additional Information

Procedures implemented in the event of a data leak

In accordance with the procedure provided for by the general data protection regulations in the event of a leak or anomaly concerning the personal data in our possession, we will notify you of the nature of the data that has leaked and the nature of the risk that may be generated, if this may affect your rights and freedoms (sensitive data) within a maximum of 72 hours after the problem has been identified.

Change of privacy policy

At our discretion, we may change our privacy policy to reflect current acceptable practices. We will take reasonable steps to notify users of the changes through our website. Your continued use of this site after any changes to this policy will be deemed acceptance of our privacy and personal information practices. If we make a material change to this privacy policy, for example changing the legal basis on which we process your personal information, we will ask you to re-consent to the changed privacy policy.

Data Protection Officer

Clément Baudet - home@sendbloop.com

Privacy Policy effective January 20, 2023.

excerpt: Sendbloop is a Zoom app that allows you to send sounds to your friends and colleagues during a Zoom meeting.
